version_description:
First of all, after the holidays, we wanted to provide you with a small update that contains several bug fixes and performance improvements.

Thank you to everyone who got in touch with us at support@3commas.io during last year.
Have a safe, wonderful and profitable year!
3Commas team

Hello, 3Commas user.
This time it is a small update to prepare for something new and important.

Thank you for being with us!
3Commas team

* New design — new login/registration screen and Dashboard.
* Summary screen — contains summarized information about coins on all your exchanges.
* Improved connectivity — the ability to connect new exchanges on My Exchanges screen.
* Subscription page — new screen where you can view and compare all available subscription plans.
* Bots and Smart Trade section — offers more information for easy viewing. Tap on a deal or trade to view details.
* Tap on an account, and you can see the number of coins, their price, the amount in $, and price change in $.
* Bot details sections — more accessible than ever, you can now see deal start conditions.
* New Help Center.

* Switch the trading mode from the app to paper trading or real trading.
* Create new Gordon bots quickly and easily.
* Small bugs and performance improvements were fixed.

Stay tuned for news and updates!

Thank you for being with us!
